resources.string:
Voice Control for Plex
Â© 2013 Chris Bellew
Licensed under GPLv3

Plex is copyright Plex, Inc.

Select a Plex Media Server to stream from. If you have more than one media server, select \"Scan All\" to search all available servers for media. If you only have one, you should select it here as scanning all servers each time will take longer to trigger playback.
Select the default client to stream media to. You can easily stream to a different client by ending your search query with \"on <client name>\", where <client name> is the name of the Plex Client.
Select which type of feedback I should give you.
Select which type of feedback I should give you when I run into problems (can\'t find something to play, etc).

Here are some examples to trigger playback:

Watch V For Vendetta
Watch Season 1 Episode 1 of Homeland
Watch Breaking Bad Season 5 Episode 8
Watch episode Once More With Feeling of Buffy The Vampire Slayer
Watch the next episode of The Walking Dead
Watch the latest episode of The Daily Show
Watch Last Week Tonight (shorter, easier form of "Watch next episode of", if there are no matching movies found)

For Music:
"Listen to Black Sands by Bonobo" (to play a single song)
Listen to the album Drink The Sea by The Glitch Mob
Listen to the album Music Has The Right To Children (Artist is optional. Specify if more than one match is found)
Listen to Pinback (play all songs by an artist, shuffled)

For playback:
Pause Playback
Resume Playback
Stop Playback

Seeking:
Offset 1 hour 15 minutes 30 seconds
Offset 30 minutes 5 seconds
Forward 1 minute
Rewind 20 minutes
Back 1 hour
(For offset only, any combination of hours, minutes, and/or seconds, in that order)
(You may also use 'timecode' instead of 'offset')
(You may use 'Back' instead of 'Rewind')

Audio and Subtitle Streams:
Cycle Subtitles
Cycle Audio
subtitle/subtitles off/on (anything with either "subtitle off/on" or "subtitles off/on" will work, e.g. "turn subtitles off", "subtitle on", etc)


If you don't have "Resume if in progress" checked, you can selectively resume by saying "Resume watching" instead of "Watch"

You can also specify a client by adding "on <client name>" to your spoken query.
Voice Control for Plex also works through utter! and AutoVoice, in combination with Tasker. Use the buttons below to visit the respective applications in the Google Play Store.
Voice Control For Plex also works with utter! and AutoVoice. Use the button below to import the Tasker project to enable this functionality.

Tasker Project imported. I will now open Tasker. Please tap on the Home Icon->Import, then select Voice Control for Plex.\n\nIf you plan to use utter!, you MUST go to utter! Settings‑>Advanced‑>Try Again‑>Select \"Send to Tasker\".
Sorry, I couldn\'t find anything to play.
Sorry, but I got an error, HTTP status code: %d
Sorry, but I got an error: %s
Sorry, you didn\'t specify a client in the main settings, or I couldn\'t find it.
I found more than one matching album. Please specify artist.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find an album to play.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find a track to play.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find the episode you specified.
Sorry, I found more than one matching show. Please be more specific.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find %1$s, or else no episodes are on deck.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find that season.
I found more than one matching movie. Please be more specific.
To trigger voice recognition, simply add the Voice Control for Plex shortcut on to your home screen via the menu.
A WiFi connection is required. Please check your WiFi settings and try again.
Voice Control for Plex is listening
You may create a shortcut that uses a specific Server and Client, or one that will use whatever your current Server and Client are set to when run. Which would you like to do?

You may create a shortcut that uses a specific Server and Client, or one that will use whatever your current Server and Client are set to when run. However, you have not scanned for Servers and/or Clients yet, so you can only create a shortcut that uses the current Server and Client. Do you wish to continue?
Enter your Plex username and password below. These will not be saved - only your Authentication Token will be saved.
Sorry, there was an unknown error trying to log in.
Please visit http://plex.tv/pin from your computer and enter the following code: %s.
Sorry, but I got an unauthorized login error. You will have to login again.
Sorry, but I got an error trying to access myPlex. You may have to logout and log back in.
Sorry, there was an error seeking: %s.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find the client you specified.
Chromecast support is available as an in-app purchase for %s. Would you like to proceed?
Sorry, but Chromecast support is only available via an in app purchase. To purchase, select your Chromecast as the client in the main settings.
While a mobile network connection is active, playback is only supported onto this device, through the official Plex client.
You must be logged in to MyPlex in order to select a server when not on WiFi.
Tap the cast icon to change the default client.
I have detected an Android Wear device. Wear support is available for %s. Would you like to proceed?
Wear support is available as an in-app purchase for %s. Would you like to proceed?
Ok, I won\'t bother you again. If you change your mind, you can enable Wear support via the menu button.

Please choose the primary function for the notification that will appear on your Wear device. You may choose between Voice Input or Play/Pause buttons. Whichever you do not choose will be a separate button (swipe up, then right).
Number of Cinema Trailers to play before a Movie
Unauthorized access response from Plex. It appears your access token is invalid. Would you like to attempt to login again?
Sorry, I couldn\'t find any tracks by %s.
Chromecast Video Quality over Local Network
Chromecast Video Quality over Remote Network
Sorry, but your username or password is incorrect.
Permission to write to the device\'s external storage is required in order to email device logs.
Sorry, but video playback is not supported on %s.
Sorry, I got an error trying to connect to %s. If this problem persists, recreate the homescreen shortcut after re-scanning for clients.
I found one or more local servers but was denied access. Log in to Plex (via the Menu button) to attempt to access this server.

I found one or more local servers but was denied access. Since you are already logged in to Plex, either log out and back in (in case your access token has changed), or verify your access to this server/servers.
To get the most out of Voice Control for Plex, logging in to your Plex account is recommended.
Sorry, but I got an error trying to connect to %s.
